ValidationRule.description: Win/Loss Amount is required when Win Only or Follow On Opportunities.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Developer" ), (text( SBU__c ) = "D&S"||text(SBU__c) = "ATR"||text(SBU__c)="BGA"),
OR (
Win_Only_Opportunity__c == true || Is_Follow_On_Opportunity__c == true|| Win_Loss_Amount__c < 1.0)|| ISBLANK(text( Win_Loss_Amount__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter Win/Loss Amount. Win/Loss Amount is required on Win-Only or Follow-On Opportunity Types.
